title: City of Fallen Angels
description: Clary is back in New York and life is good: she's training to be a Shadowhunter and is finally able to call Jace her boyfriend. But nothing comes without a price. When Jace inexplicably begins to pull away from her, Clary is forced to acknowledge that she herself has set in motion a chain of events that could lead to the loss of everything she loves. Even Jace.Love. Blood. Betrayal. Revenge. The stakes are higher than ever...
author: Cassandra Clare
